author: Jason Davison
comment: This is a decent face but I have a couple of issues. (1) The step counter is not linked to Google Fit, so the step information is not in sync. Seems like this would be the best way to show step information instead of trying to calculate it yourself. (2) The settings say the Heart Rate Sensor is not detected. I have an LG G Watch R and this is one of the main reasons I purchased the watch face.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Jason,My sincere apologize if our watch face did not meet your expectations. Note: IF you are  Android Marshmallow users have to enable permissions for Sensors on your phone and in watch to get the heart rate reading and steps count ,You need to give the permission individually   to all watch faces,Thank you

author: lazer tag
comment: my huawei watch keeps saying "no heart sensor" how can that be? i have a sensor! i bought this face for the active continuous heart rate.. and it doesn't work! please tell me how to fix this

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Ali,My sincere apologize if our watch face did not meet your expectations. Note: IF you are  Android Marshmallow users have to enable permissions for Sensors on your phone and in watch to get the heart rate reading and steps count ,You need to give the permission individually   to all watch faces,Thank you

title: No pulse monitor

author: Tim Honl
comment: Latest version on my LG Watch Urbane says there is No Heart Sensor - LG app for measuring heartbeat works fine.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Tim,Thank you for pointing out the defect. We'll rectify it shortly. Use the watch face again and kindly consider your review, if you feel it is good.

author: Shawn Weaver
comment: Don't you dare use your app to give me extra unwanted notifications without an option to opt out.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Shawn, Very sorry to hear you've experienced this issue.  We'd like to look into it further for you to get it set up soon ,Thanks for your Feedback

author: Jeremy T.
comment: The transparent watch hands are a nice touch.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Jeremy, Your review is a bonus which kindles our positive energy. Thank you. Kindly keep in touch.

author: Matt B
comment: Nice face but needs more customisation. Like where to put date battery etc. Also the ability to have a small digital clock within the watch face would be awesome. Looking forward to the updates

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: We are happy to know that you like the watch face.  We will consider your proposition in our next update, Thanks for your Support

title: Needs more customisation

author: Thomas B
comment: I did like it until the app started to notify me to try other apps from the publisher. If you want spam popping up on your phone this is the app to get.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: We don't spam you with other apps, all the apps we recommend you is our company apps, anyway we will remove you from notification right now and sorry for disturbing you, kindly reconsider the review it would help you

author: eria
comment: Classy, stylish and clean. This is by far my favorite watchface. I recently reset my watch because I was switching phones and I couldn't find this watch face. I was lost without it. Keep up the great work and keep those watchfaces coming.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: We are glad to know that you like the watch face,Thank you for the support :)

title: Best watchface

author: Raul Avila
comment: Its fixed!!!

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Raul,Thank you for the support please consider the other watch faces too

title: Glitches

author: Luigi Porcu
comment: I think your idea is good  the display is superlative clean but as is its not very usable hearth rate rate sensor constantly on eve when its charging ???    The user should have option to access the application when is needed  The face is beautifully done but lack of two very important thing for a smart watch need. Missed call and missed massages This is why people buy smart watches ..... Unless its fixed,  i think i wasted my money,  I doubt my watch is getting annoyed or interested whilst charging... Can you please fix it and than you will have created  a truly 5 star face very  innovative and clean  design  A ) Sensor on and off at user request  B)  Notify user of missing messages and emails  Otherwise may as well use a normal watch........  i will be very happy to give it a five star but not as it is..............  I leave it in your capable hands....

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content:
Thanks for the suggestions Luigi. . . the updates will hit you sooner than you expect.

Recent Update
We have updated the app now you can switch on/off the sensors heart rate and also the step sensor sure your watch will long hours as we save battery, RATE us Five star and support us

title: The idea is good  but marred by the sensor constantly on.... no user option
